issue.title: [Documentation][FlightRPC] Add prose and API documentation for Flight SQL
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-14698](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14698). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Once Flight SQL lands (ARROW-12922, ARROW-14421) we should add documentation:
 \* Protocol-level documentation similar to that for Flight,
 \* Sequence diagrams for the request flow,
 \* API documentation in C++ and Java.
 \* Example server/client.
